contract in.translation[0].definitions[0: to arrange for a person or company outside your own organization to come in and do a particular job
contract in.translation[0].definitions[1: to agree officially to take part in something
The rules require all members to contract in.
contract in.translation[1].definitions[0: to agree officially to take part in an arrangement
The company pension scheme was started last June, and since then 1500 employees have contracted in.
